lenders.name: Vecchio Memorial
lenders.occupation: Bob was a Professor and SMA Fellow
lenders.loan_because:
A prodigious business scholar, Vecchio published numerous articles in the Journal of Applied Psychology, the Academy of Management Journal, the Academy of Management Review, Organizational Behavior and Human Decision Processes, Personnel Psychology, the Journal of Management, the Journal of Organizational Behavior, and Leadership Quarterly.  He also served on the editorial boards of the Academy of Management Review, the Academy of Management Learning & Education Journal, the Journal of Management, Leadership Quarterly, the Journal of Occupational and Organizational Psychology, Group and Organization Management, Employee Responsibilities and Rights Journal, and other journals. 

Vecchio was a fellow of the American Psychological Association, the Society for Industrial and Organizational Psychology, the Southern Management Association, and the American Psychological Society.
lenders.occupational_info: This memorial initially created on behalf of the Southern Management Association Fellows

Dear respected one ,

I am the owner of  Rakadri GHANA LTD ,A  member of the National Association of Sheanut Farmers Processors and Buyers of Ghana with a wide range of services in the CENTRAL ABABOU SUPPER MARKET OF TAMALE GHANA.
We are looking for a loan or an investor for an amount of US$ 200,000.00 for business and if this investment proposal succeeds will establish a small unit  that will be in charge of MICRO FINANCE and RURAL ENTERPRISE PROJECT DEVELOPMENT FINANCING .Our local women are looking for support to help them in their shea butter procesings , trade and others.
Thank you

Ahmed rayan kadiri

MD of RAKADRI GHANA LTD

lenders.name: Patti Pokorchak
lenders.loan_because:
I"ve been self-employed since 1992 and I feel that is the way to have greater control over your life. You determine what you will earn and how you will earn it. It is a lot of responsibility but also brings with it a lot of freedom and sense of pride.

I"ve traveled to several under-developed countries and realize how 'rich' we are here in N. America compared to others and want to share some of that richness to make others lives easier. I like to encourage those who look after themselves rather than waiting for social assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small businesses become more profitable with my practical advice! I"ve worked in a number of different countries, industries and businesses, so have  a wide knowledge base to draw from.

lenders.name: Oliver
lenders.loan_because:
need additional capital for buying various models of
celfones at wholesale price.
lenders.occupational_info: i am enjoying my business with big earning, what sad only is i can not expand my business as well as my income due to insufficient capital. If possible, i want to loan at least not lower than $2,000 in order for me to get different models of celfones at wholeale price. As of now, my celfone stock averages 6 units a day only. There were days, my wife and my staffs sell 6 units or more in just one day, forcing us to buy again in the city the following day. in that 6 units of celfone, i even need to divide it so that my other shop can also display celfone thus leaving only 3 celfone in my display rack. Profit in celfone bussiness is guaranteed here in my country Philippines because Philippines is number 1 text capital in the world.

lenders.name: Abram
lenders.loan_because: I think microloans are a great opportunity to reach out and help a global community help itself
lenders.occupational_info: I work in computer chip Test research and development.  I look out in time 6-8 years and try and decipher what high-volume manufacturing Test solutions we'll need.

lenders.name: Boo
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because it is a correct use for my wealth.

PS: it is my kiddo that actually decides on the loans :-)
lenders.occupational_info: For my real job I drive an ambulance, and provide emergency medical care.  As a student I study painting and printmaking.

lenders.name: kathy dlz
lenders.loan_because: a small thing can make a big difference (:

lenders.name: Jason Fung
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is the best SUSTAINABLE way I know of to help people around the world.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the courts doing a lot of data entry with computers, filing, and answering questions over the phone.

lenders.name: Evelin & Danny
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy to help someone else just by sitting at your computer. Why not show some gratitude for what we have and pass a small part on to someone else in need.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people improve their physical and emotional wellbeing in a natural way, anything from bruises, coughs, infections to anxiety, depression or Autism.

lenders.name: vivian
lenders.loan_because: I am hoping to be able to make a difference to somebody's live, prescribing to Kiva loans is my feel good moment of a day, at least i will have made somebody happy ...
lenders.occupational_info: working as project manager for computer applications for big corporation

lenders.name: John and CB
lenders.loan_because: The Lord has blessed us with loving families, friends, education, and many opportunities to pursue our passions.  His Son Jesus Christ has commanded us to care for those in need.  To this end, we seek to use our resources as tools to love and help others.  Through microlending we hope to bless others just as we have been blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: John works in management consulting focusing on business strategy.  CB is a full-time student pursuing a Master's in Environmental Management.  They currently live in Singapore.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I work in training and education

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people realise their potential

lenders.name: Era Tech.net
lenders.loan_because: We believe in empowering the less fortunate ones in order to help and assist with their business needs.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a web solutions company and encourage to volunteer to spread goodwill around the world.

lenders.name: Chris and family
lenders.loan_because: my family and I wish to help others

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I didn't know there was anything like this out there,,, and it's such a good idea. Hopefully I can help someone achieve their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a TV News Producer.

lenders.name: Brigitte
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who have dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I help children who don't speak and read well and in writing difficulties.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: I care about people who live outside my own country.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on a computer all day at a small bank called a credit union.  I have an office with no window and I miss the sunshine.

lenders.name: Vaniah
lenders.loan_because: it makes sense

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because:
I hope to help empower people to succeed and to glorify God.  
"Whatever you do, do for the glory of God"
lenders.occupational_info: Married with 2 kids

lenders.name: John R. Bryan
lenders.loan_because: Loan inspire trust. Gifts inspire dependencies.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I want to take an active role in helping the developing world, especially the Middle East and Central Asia.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at the University of Virginia.

lenders.name: Marian
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important that we all do what we can to help our fellow human beings.  If I have the means to help, then I have a moral obligation to do just that.  Microfinancing feels more personal than simply donating to a charity (esp. if you don't know where that money is going).

lenders.name: Adriana
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Dagmar
lenders.loan_because: ...denn die Freude, die wir geben, kehrt ins eig'ne Herz zurück.

lenders.name: Thuan
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to support women's economic empowerment movement.
lenders.occupational_info: Promoting Women's Economic Empowerment.

lenders.name: nodeposit
lenders.loan_because: Get your biggest prizes only here!

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I know I am helping someone help themselves.  It's not charity; it's a helping hand.  And I get a huge kick out of it in general :)
lenders.occupational_info: Taking x-rays

lenders.name: Deeba Hargis
lenders.loan_because: Love, Greatness, and Prosperity Abounds! Abundance flows into my network group, Higher Purpose Business Network, The Greatness Foundation, OfficeOnTheInternet.com, and my company, EXCEL-WEST.com.
lenders.occupational_info:
Love, Greatness and Prosperity

project management tools, project scheduling, web project management, software development management, web based crm, risk management software, project management program, managing projects, task management software, vision engineering, software design website design 2.0, social network engineering, trend spotting, to name a few.

lenders.name: Samantha, Mikey, & Nicky
lenders.occupational_info: Samantha, Mikey, and Nicky are siblings who were born and raised in the suburbs of New York.  Samantha (the eldest) is a graduate of the University of Pennsylvania and is currently working for Microsoft in Seattle, Washington.  Mikey (the middle child) is a student at Georgetown University.  Nicky (the youngest) is a student at Fordham University.
